sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-container fluid class="grey lighten 5">
      User Profile
      <BuildPortfolio
        v-if="userDetail.id"
        :userID="userDetail.id"/>
      <v-card v-if="userDetail.active_rp">
        <v-row
          @click="showRP = !showRP">
          <v-col>
            <v-card-title>
              Risk Profiles
            </v-card-title>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row v-if="showRP">
          <v-col
          :cols="10">
            <v-select
                :items="riskProfileGroups"
                @change="forceRerender()"
                item-text="name"
                item-value="id"
                v-model="userDetail.active_rp"
                outlined dense>
            </v-select>
          </v-col>
          <v-col
          :cols="2">
            <AddRPGroup
              :userID="[userDetail.id]"
              @add-rpgroup="addRPGroup"/>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-card>
        <RiskProfileTable
          :RPGroupID="userDetail.active_rp"
          :key="rpKey"
          v-if="showRP" />
    </v-container>
  </v-card >
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service";
import RiskProfileTable from "@/components/RiskProfileTable.vue";
import AddRPGroup from "@/components/AddRPGroup.vue";
import BuildPortfolio from "@/components/BuildPortfolio.vue";


export default {
  name: "profile",
  data() {
    return {
      riskProfileGroups: [],
      active: false,
      userDetail: {},
      rpKey:0,
      showRP: false,
    };
  },
  components: {
    RiskProfileTable,
    AddRPGroup,
    BuildPortfolio,
  },
  methods: {
    forceRerender(){
      this.rpKey += 1;
    },
    addRPGroup(data){
      this.userDetail.active_rp = data.id;
      this.forceRerender();
      this.getRPGroups();
    },
    getRPGroups() {
      let endpoint = `/api/riskprofilegroups/`;
      apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
        this.riskProfileGroups = data.results;
      });
    },
    getUserData() {
      let endpoint = `/api/user/`;
      apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
        this.userDetail = data;
      });
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getRPGroups();
    this.getUserData();
  }
};
</script>
